inclusion.criterion: A 30 French Foley will be placed either digitally or with speculum assistance.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Scheduled induction of labor with indication and timing supported by the Family Birth Center induction of labor guideline entitled "Induction of labor: Indications and Timing".
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Amniotic fluid index greater than or equal to 5 centimeters
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Formal prenatal ultrasound documenting the absence of placenta previa
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The woman is able to give appropriate consent and has undergone an informed consent process.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Maternal age ≥ 18 years old at the time of consent.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: the patient may receive pharmacologic pain relief in the form of one dose of acetaminophen and/or fentanyl.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Cesarean delivery will not be performed for arrest of labor or failed induction unless all criteria have been met as outlined by the Family Birth Center Workgroup protocol made effective 6/2/14.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Inpatient usual care group: If the patient was randomized or chose the control group (inpatient usual care), she will arrive to the Family Birth Center at 1900 to undergo induction of labor.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient has abdominal pain lasting about 4 days accompanied by nausea and 2 episodes of vomiting. She has a history of hypercholesterolemia and two C/sections.
